data.title: Alsace-Lorraine flag
data.meta_description: Here's my minor attempt at an Alsace-Lorraine flag:
data.text:
Here's my minor attempt at an Alsace-Lorraine flag:

OK,

1) It could be smaller, though I admit it is annoying to sort that.

2) All you've done is take the coat of arms and made it into a flag, but for some reason you flipped the top left section.Nothing new or different and you don't give any backstory whatsoever. Which leads to:

3) Does this really need a new thread just for it? I mean there is a fully functional flag thread, and you can see just how horrendously packed the AHBM section is nowadays.

My advice, make it smaller and put it in the correct thread, then stop making a new thread for everything you do.
